attributes.action: establish an emergency plan to protect the population in case of an attack by 'Zombies', or other re-animated corpses.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Although it is unlikely that a situation such as a 'Zombie' attack will ever arise,  we the undersigned believe that it is important to at least set up an emergency plan that will defend the population of our country, just in case.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
